channel.title: magna carta – Angry Bear
channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: The Magna Carta and privitization
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Via Toms Dispatch Tomgram: Noam Chomsky, The Great Charter, Its Fate, and Ours…Posted by Noam Chomsky comes this essay on our long traditions in the battle of the commons and ‘privatization’. It is an interesting read. (hat tip Dale)
item.content:encoded: Via Toms Dispatch Tomgram: Noam Chomsky, The Great Charter, Its Fate, and Ours…Posted by Noam Chomsky comes this essay on our long traditions in the battle of the commons and ‘privatization’.   It is an interesting read.   (hat tip Dale)

item.title: The Magna Carta: What it is and what it isn’t.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: by Bruce Webb (Somehow I got caught in HTML hell and can’t get this post to render correctly, not only did the read more not work it took out a paragraph with it. So I moved the post over to my site: The Magna Carta: What it is and what it isn’t It does feed […]
item.content:encoded:
by Bruce Webb

(Somehow I got caught in HTML hell and can’t get this post to render correctly, not only did the read more not work it took out a paragraph with it. So I moved the post over to my site: The Magna Carta: What it is and what it isn’t It does feed into the Kennedy-Webb discussion below. But if you are interested you will have to take it on over to the Bruce Web, because I can’t figure out what went wrong)
